enhanced_by.reason: The 'increased' map must be set before calling 'isCoreChanged' to determine if there are any increased schemas.
The 'missing' map must be set before calling 'isCoreChanged' to determine if there are any missing schemas.
Both 'isCoreChanged' and 'isChanged' methods determine the compatibility of changes, making 'isChanged' a good candidate for assertions.
The 'calculateCoreChanged' method in 'ChangedSchema' shares similar logic for determining core changes, making it useful for constructing assertions.
